name: Found Guys
description:
The final version of Found Guys is out now! 

Found Guys is a game where you find items in a room! Inspired by the old TV game show called Finders Keepers. Either in single player or multiplayer, can you find the the different items in the amount of time? Let's find out!

This version improves and expands the game in many areas. From the visual style to the single player content. We hope you enjoy Found Guys!

This game was originally made for Global Game Jam 2021 and then expanded for Games Innovation Challenge hosted by NSE and Barclays .

Found Guys VS came in 3rd place for Games Innovation Challenge! 

Controls (web version):

Move - WASD

Jump - Space

Hold and Throw - Enter

Escape - Pause

More controllers are supported in the .exe version.

Older Versions:

Found Guys VS:  https://squidmaker.itch.io/found-guys-vs

Found Guys Classic: https://squidmaker.itch.io/found-guys-classic
